alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 20 at 8:56PM CST until December 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SOUTHWESTERN FWZ 313 FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHWESTERN FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 313... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 6 PM MST Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 313. Generally along and south of a line from Broadwater to Harrisburg. * WIND...West wind 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...8 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills
